title: 2020 Polls, Trade, Iran Sanctions
itunes:title: 2020 Polls, Trade, Iran Sanctions
description:
Guests: Antjuan Seawright, Democratic Strategist, Founder and CEO of Blueprint Strategy and Former Senior Advisor to Hillary Clinton and Scott Tranter, CEO of 0ptimus and former Data Science Director for Marco Rubio for President.

Brian Hook, U.S. Special Representative for Iran discussed Iran sanctions and the idea of President Donald Trump meeting with Hassan Rouhani.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
